title: The PARTYPRESS Database
authors: Cornelius Erfort, Lukas F. Stoetzer, and Heike Klüver
abstract: We present the PARTYPRESS Database: more than 250,000 press releases from 68 parties in 9 European countries, with supervised ML classification into 21 issue categories (2010 onward).
bibtex: @article{erfort_2023, title = {The PARTYPRESS Database}, author = {Erfort, Cornelius and Stoetzer, Lukas F and Klüver, Heike}, journal = {Research & Politics}, volume = {10}, number = {3}, year = {2023}, doi = {10.1177/20531680231183512}}
